channel.title: [pi]Source ip not client ip
channel.description:
Greetings everyone, I need help people can't connect to my server becoz I'm using local ip for my source.I know how to change the ip client sided but dunno how to source sided.I've heard that I have to change only client ip not source.But I tried the client won't connect if i change the client ip else from 127.0.0.1.Please tell me what to seach in server sided client.java
Regards Ayush Arya

item.title: [pi]Source ip not client ip
item.dc:creator: @Ayush_Arya Ayush Arya
item.description:
@Ayush_Arya wrote:

i just needa know how to change ip in pi source.i am using pi/dspk insidiax v8 base and client

Read full topic

item.title: [pi]Source ip not client ip
item.dc:creator: @someone2 someone2
item.description:
@someone2 wrote:

For people to connect you have to open the port your server is on (43594 usually) in your router And in your firewall. You have to change the IP in the client to your no-ip (or w/e you’re using). You also have to change the IP in the source.

I don’t know how to change IP’s in PI as I have never used it and don’t even know what it looks like, so you have to find that out yourself.

Read full topic
